footer.tagline: Win rare collectible cards and memorabilia. UK-based prize competitions with transparent draws and guaranteed authenticity.
footer.freePostalEntry: Free postal entry available. See rules

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Enter our prize competitions in 4 simple steps and win amazing collectibles
howItWorks.pageSubtitle: Win your dream collectible cards and memorabilia in just four simple steps. Our competitions are fair, transparent, and fully compliant with UK law.
howItWorks.step1Desc: Browse our selection of premium collectible cards and memorabilia competitions.
howItWorks.step1FullDesc: Explore our selection of premium collectible cards including Pokemon, One Piece TCG, sports cards, and signed memorabilia. Each competition clearly shows the prize value, ticket price, and number of tickets available.
howItWorks.step2Subtitle: Pick your lucky numbers or use random
howItWorks.step2Desc: Pick your lucky numbers or let us choose randomly. Buy more for bonus tickets!
howItWorks.step2FullDesc: Choose specific ticket numbers that feel lucky to you, or let our system randomly select available numbers. The more tickets you purchase, the better your chances of winning. Bonus tickets are included with larger purchases.
howItWorks.step3Subtitle: Prove your knowledge with our skill question
howItWorks.step3Desc: Answer a simple skill question to validate your entry. It is easy!
howItWorks.step3FullDesc: To comply with UK law, each entry requires you to correctly answer a skill-based question. This ensures our competitions are classified as prize competitions rather than lotteries, keeping everything legal and fair.
howItWorks.step4Subtitle: Winners drawn fairly using certified RNG
howItWorks.step4Desc: Wait for the draw and you could win incredible collectibles worth thousands!
howItWorks.step4FullDesc: Once all tickets are sold or the draw date arrives, we conduct a transparent draw using certified Random Number Generation. The winning ticket number is published, and the lucky winner receives their prize.
howItWorks.skillQuestionDesc: Under the UK Gambling Act 2005, prize competitions must include an element of skill to distinguish them from lotteries. This is why we include a multiple-choice question with every entry.
howItWorks.skillQuestionInfo: The questions are designed to test genuine knowledge related to the collectibles world. They are challenging enough to require thought, but fair for anyone with an interest in the hobby.
howItWorks.skillQuestionExample: Example question: In what year was the first Pokemon TCG Base Set released in Japan?
howItWorks.skillQuestionConclusion: This type of question requires actual knowledge, not just luck, ensuring our competitions remain legal and fair.
howItWorks.certifiedRngDesc: We use a certified Random Number Generator to ensure every draw is completely fair and unbiased. The RNG is cryptographically secure and cannot be manipulated.
howItWorks.transparentResultsDesc: Every draw result is published publicly, showing the winning ticket number, date and time of the draw, and the anonymised winner details. Full transparency is our priority.
howItWorks.independentSupervisionDesc: For high-value prizes, draws are conducted under independent supervision. We may also live stream draws on social media for complete transparency.
howItWorks.secureDeliveryDesc: Winners receive their prizes via tracked, insured delivery. Every item is carefully packaged and photographed before dispatch for your peace of mind.
howItWorks.freeEntryDesc: In accordance with UK regulations, we offer a free postal entry route for all our competitions. This ensures everyone has the opportunity to participate, regardless of their financial situation.
howItWorks.freeEntryStep1: Write a letter including your full name, email address, and the competition you wish to enter
howItWorks.freeEntryStep2: Include your chosen ticket number(s) and your answer to the skill question
howItWorks.freeEntryStep3: Send via standard post (1st or 2nd class) to our registered address
howItWorks.freeEntryStep4: One free entry per person per competition is permitted
howItWorks.freeEntryNote: Free postal entries are treated exactly the same as paid entries in the draw. There is no discrimination between entry methods.
howItWorks.postalAddressValue: WinUCard Ltd, Competition Entry, [Address Line 1], [City, Postcode], United Kingdom

cta.title: Ready to Win?
cta.subtitle: Browse our live competitions and enter for your chance to win incredible collectible cards and memorabilia. Your next big win could be just one ticket away!
cta.disclaimer: 18+ Only. Free postal entry available on all competitions.

cookies.bannerMessage: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, analyse site traffic, and personalise content. By clicking "Accept", you consent to our use of cookies.

about.title: About WinUCard
about.subtitle: Your trusted destination for premium collectible card and memorabilia prize competitions in the United Kingdom.
about.missionText1: At WinUCard, we believe that everyone should have the opportunity to own their dream collectibles. Whether it is a PSA 10 Charizard, a signed sports jersey, or a rare One Piece TCG card, we make it possible through fair, transparent, and exciting prize competitions.
about.missionText2: Founded by collectors, for collectors, we understand the passion that drives our community. Our mission is to create a trusted platform where collectors can compete for amazing prizes while enjoying a fair and regulated experience.
about.valueTransparencyDesc: Every draw is conducted using certified RNG with results published publicly. We believe in complete transparency in everything we do.
about.valuePassionDesc: We are collectors ourselves. We understand the thrill of finding that grail card and want to make it accessible to everyone.
about.valueFairPlayDesc: Our competitions are designed to give everyone a fair chance. Free postal entry ensures accessibility for all.
about.valueCommunityDesc: We are building a community of collectors who share our passion. Your trust and satisfaction are our top priorities.
about.teamSubtitle: We are a passionate team of collectors and tech enthusiasts dedicated to creating the best prize competition experience.
about.complianceText1: WinUCard operates as a prize competition platform in full compliance with the UK Gambling Act 2005. Our competitions include a skill-based question requirement and a free postal entry route, ensuring we meet all regulatory standards.
about.complianceText2: We are committed to responsible gaming practices. All participants must be 18 years or older, and we encourage responsible participation in our competitions.
about.getInTouchText: Have questions about WinUCard? We would love to hear from you.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our prize competitions. Can not find what you are looking for? Contact us and we will help.
faq.noFaqsMessage: We are working on adding frequently asked questions. In the meantime, please contact us with any questions you may have.
faq.stillHaveQuestionsText: Our support team is here to help. Get in touch and we will respond as soon as possible.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have a question or need help? We are here for you. Send us a message and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.name: Name
contact.subject: Subject
contact.sentMessage: Thank you for your message. We will get back to you soon.
contact.responseTimeValue: We aim to respond to all enquiries within 24-48 hours during business days.
contact.quickAnswersText: Check out our FAQ section for answers to common questions about competitions, payments, delivery, and more.

categoriesHero.description: From rare Pokémon cards to One Piece TCG, from football legends to basketball icons. Explore our premium collectible card competitions and win the card you've always dreamed of.
